title.narrative: HT Center and Artibonite Regional Development

description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are to: (a) support the development of the Centre Artibonite Loop region, primarily by enhancing all-weather connectivity and logistics for producers, and the region's resilience to climate change; and (b) support the Recipient's capacity to respond promptly and effectively to an Eligible Emergency, as needed.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Appointment of Auditor | Description :The Recipient shall appoint an independent auditor with terms of referenceand qualifications acceptable to the Association, in accordance with the provision set up in the Financing Agreement, Schedule 2,Section III, by not later than four (4) months as of the Effective Date. | Due Date :31-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Road Maintenance Centers | Description :The Recipient shall have the road maintenance centers established or tobe established in Hinche, Mirebalais and Saint Michel staffed and equipped in a manner satisfactory to the Association throughoutthe duration of the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Update List of Eligible Roads to FER | Description :The Recipient shall, throughout the duration of the Project,periodically add the roads which are rehabilitated under Part A.1 of the Project to the subsequent updated list of eligible roadsunder the Road Maintenance Fund. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
